sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连接副词均有"因此，所以"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: accordingly, consequently, hence, so, therefore, thus
means: accordingly ：书面用词，强调根据某种原因而得出的结果，其前可用冒号或分号，但不用逗号。
consequently ：正式用词，侧重符合逻辑的结果。
hence ：较正式用词，指接下来的东西是理所当然的必需的东西，但强调其重要性。
so ：用于比较随便的场合，口语中多用。
therefore ：通常指引出一个推断出的必然结论。
thus ：多用于书面语中，可与therefore换用。

sentence.Network_en: We have to discover his plans and act accordingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们得找出他的计划，照着办。

sentence.Network_en: Watch out for sharp bends and adjust your speed accordingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 当心急转弯并相应调整车速。

sentence.Network_en: Please inform us of your decision and we will act accordingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 请把你们的决定通知我们,我们会照着去办的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高考英语常见单词_百度文库 ... access n. 接近，通道，入口 accordingly ad. 因此，依照 account n. 记述，解释，帐目.
总结一些英语写作常用副词（六级）_百度知道 ... 一般来说 by and large 于是 accordingly 的确 indeed,truly.
以a开头的英语单词_百度文库 ... accompany 陪伴 accordingly 相应地 accuracy 准确性.
四级词汇表_百度文库 ... accessory n. 同谋，从犯；附件 accordingly ad. 因此；照着 accumulate vt. 积累.

list.abs: please inform us of your decision and we will act accordingly .请告知我们你的决定，我们将会采取相应的行动。
Sinograma « 办 » - Diccionario de Sinogramas ... 兴办[ initiate;set up] 照办[ act accordingly] 置办[ buy;purchase].
简单一小步丰富每一天|英语阅读... ... 2. Record your performance2.  记录你的进度。 3. Adjust accordingly3. 合理调整.
希参考为荷　for your reference only希各查照　implemented accordingly析产　division
business report at levels usd 8076-9.00 will invite your offer accordingly .交易价格在8。76－9。00美元之间，故请你方报价。

entry.def: You use accordingly to introduce a fact or situation which is a result or consequence of something that you have just referred to.

example.ex: We have a different background, a different history. Accordingly, we have the right to different futures...
example.tran: 我们有不同的背景和不同的历史。因此，我们有权拥有不同的未来。

example.ex: The workforce have recently been calling for their working hours to be reduced. Many companies have accordingly switched to a five-day week.
example.tran: 工人们最近一直在呼吁缩短工作时间。许多公司于是转成了一周五天工作制。

entry.def: If you consider a situation and then act accordingly, the way you act depends on the nature of the situation.

example.ex: It is a difficult job and they should be paid accordingly...
example.tran: 这是份棘手的工作，他们应得到相应的报酬。

example.ex: The new government will make a judgment about its interests and act accordingly.
example.tran: 新政府将对其利害得失作出判断，并采取相应的行动。

means.word_mean: 1. (sentence connectors) because of the reason given;

sentences.sentence: "continued to have severe headaches and accordingly returned to the doctor"

auth_sentence.content: Treatment methods can be readily evaluated and modified accordingly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Treatment methods can be readily evaluated and modified accordingly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Treatment methods can be readily evaluated and modified accordingly.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地

exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地

fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及

like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能

mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心

natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地

positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻

unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地

week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: The importance of non-financial firms will accordingly rise, along with their ability to attract the best talent.
As these decisions and agreements are made, we modify our behavior accordingly.

sentences.en: Please inform us of your decision and we will act accordingly.
sentences.cn: 请把你们的决定通知我们, 我们会照着去办的。

means.word_mean: 因此, 所以, 于是

sentences.en: He was told to speak briefly; accordingly he cut short his remarks.
sentences.cn: 人家叫他说话简短, 于是他就长话短说了。

jushi.english: These are the rules, act accordingly.
jushi.chinese: 这些都是规定,照着办就是了。

jushi.english: He was told to speak briefly; accordingly he cut short his remarks.
jushi.chinese: 人家叫他说话简短,于是他就长话短说了。

jushi.english: They have broken the rules and will be punished accordingly.
jushi.chinese: 他们违反了规定,将会受到相应的惩罚。
